title: How-To: Upgrading from Non-OSS to OSS Beats Log Shippers
description:
Outlines steps for upgrading Beats-based shippers from non-OSS distributions to OSS ones,
ensuring configuration compatibility and minimal downtime.

examples.name: Upgrade Beats package
examples.description: High-level example of replacing a non-OSS Beats package with an OSS one.
examples.query:
systemctl stop filebeat
rpm -Uvh filebeat-oss.rpm
systemctl start filebeat
